content:
A true classic never goes out of style, and in the candle game, it doesnâ€™t get more classic than Yankee Candle.  
Founded in 1969 in South Hadley, Mass., this New England-based company has grown over the years to become one of the most recognizable brands in the business. With more than 600 aromas available, the best Yankee Candle scents can whisk you away to the sandy shores of your favorite beach or to your favorite pumpkin patch, without ever forcing you to put on your shoes and leave the house

title: Shining The Light On: Leatherback Naturals
content: Owner Alexandra hails from the great state of Florida, birthing her candle company on her momâ€™s dining room table. As a fun-loving creative, she wanted to create something with her hands that celebrated all the things we love about Florida. Alexandraâ€™s candles are very natural â€“ made with a coconut wax and infused with essential oils. She uses wooden wicks (or 100% cotton for the smaller candles) and has a select line of fragrances available on Etsy. Weâ€™ve had a great time getting to know her and what her products bring to the table.

title: product introduction
content:
#   About this Fragrance

## This is a Fruity fragrance.
A taste of the tropics â€” warm coconut blended with pineapple and Tahitian vanilla. Fragrance Notes: Top: Salty Air, Pineapple Mid: Fresh Coconut, Lei Blossom Base: Airy Musk, Tahitian Vanilla Top note is the initial impression of the fragrance, middle note is the main body of the scent, and base is its final impression. Coconut Beach is Fruity.
![COCONUT BEACH01.png](/uploads/COCONUT_BEACH_01_85904af1e2.png)
## Description
Our Votive Candles offer you the perfect opportunity to try a new fragrance in your home. Use your favorites in Votive Candle Holders to complement existing decor on your bedside table, vanity, or end table, or just to add great dimension to candlescapes and centerpieces. They also have a self-extinguishing feature â€” the flame goes out on its own once all the wax is gone.
